before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bs4ib","text":"The soil samples used in this work were collected using a soil auger from the upper 10cm of the soil core by a collaborator. Where possible, I removed soil from the centre of the core for analysis in order to minimise the potential for sample cross-contamination. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8km00","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmnbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dveu7","text":"Affordable DNA extraction and purification from soil samples at scale. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95gib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ecs9","text":"This protocol outlines an affordable DNA extraction and purification technique to be used with soil samples processed at scale. In the materials section, I provide details on how to make up reagents for each step. I provide the steps of the protocol in detail. The protocol steps follow the physical and chemical lysis of cells present in soils, the flocculation of various inhibitors of PCR, and the purification of extracted DNA by repeated centrifuging steps that bind and then elute DNA using a silica filter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3mib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1e7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ql8g","text":"When eluted in 1 mM Tris, the purified DNA can survive several freeze-thaw cycles. Depending on the samples analysed the purified DNA may benefit from additional dilution prior to PCR, especially if the end material is discoloured to a soil-brown.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3a388","text":"Buffer components ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g39o","text":"       ComponentContentsRequiredChemical molarityper Lper 100 mLpHLysis solution 1guanidine thiocyanate147 mM118.1617.33 g1.73 g9.0trisodium phosphate228 mM380.1386.67 g8.67 gsodium chloride26 mM58.441.5 g0.15 g1 M Tris HCl67 mM-67 mL6.7 mL0.5 M EDTA27 mM-53 mL5.3 mLLysis solution 2aluminium ammonium sulphate*90 mM453.3340.8 g4.08 g-SDS1.25 %-12.5 g1.25 gProtein flocculantammonium acetate5 M77.0825385.41 g38.54 g-Inhibitor flocculant 1aluminium ammonium sulphate*180 mM453.3381.6 g8.16 g-Inhibitor flocculant 2calcium chloride dihydrate204 mM147.0130 g3 g-Binding solutionguanidine HCl5.5 M95.53525.42 g52.54 g-Wash solutionEtOH80 %----Elution bufferPure H2O or 1mM Tris----8.0","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":681}],"data":{}},{"key":"dvgg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4fin","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l045","text":"Adjust the pH of Lysis solution 1 to 9.0 with 5M HCl and bring to volume with ddH2O. This will probably require much less than 20 ml of HCl and should be mixed in the fume hood. All other components apart from Elution buffer are used at the pH of the mixture without modification. Sterilise all solutions in a suitable manner (autoclave or related_equipments.name: 96 well DNA plate with membrane (960ul each well)

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vvi7","text":" Add 2g of 1.0mm to 1.4mm diameter acid-washed garnet beads to a 5ml Eppendorf screw-cap tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f36mo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74f08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej2qg","text":"Add 2200μL of Lysis Solution 1 and vortex briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqb65","text":"Add 0.25g of sample to the tube, and shake briefly by hand to mix the contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8buk3","text":"Place in Geno/Grinder 2010 with appropriate adapters and shake at 1750 RPM for 2 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"919jq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nvrp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3018,"brand":"SPEX CertiPrep™","can_edit":0,"guid":"41D6CC30731B11EC86214BA4FDD0B86B","link":null,"name":"Geno/Grinder  2010","sku":"12605297","specifications":null,"type":"Pulverizer and Cell Lyser","vendor":{"id":31,"name":"Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.fishersci.com/us/en/home.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f4i1f","text":"Wait 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"acqn4","text":"Grind again for an additional 2 mins at 1750 RPM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kep1","text":"Add 800μL of Lysis Solution 2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sklf","text":"Centrifuge at 4,000xg for 1 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vv0k","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fd5d9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"95C946B0731B11EC86214BA4FDD0B86B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg77p","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a fresh 1.5ml tube - or Transfer 1ml and save 500μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9k4t","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature. Transfer 500μl of supernatant to fresh tube 1.5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al6q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jsc0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B438DF20731B11EC86214BA4FDD0B86B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"122gh","text":"Add 200 μl volume of Protein flocculant, vortex briefly, and incubate on ice for a minimum of 10 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":21,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kavn","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9bfs","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5b434","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CDEC6A90732511EC86214BA4FDD0B86B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"brb61","text":"Transfer supernatant to fresh tube 1.5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57ck5","text":"Make an Inhibitor flocculant master mix composed of:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":31},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14m12","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4oje","text":"    n x 110 μl of Inhibitor flocculant 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":23},{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmhps","text":"and","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oltv","text":"    n x 110 μl of Inhibitor flocculant 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":22},{"style":"italic","offset":18,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33obs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8adts","text":"Where n is the number of samples purified","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rqb4","text":"Add 200 μl of Inhibitor flocculant mastermix to each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":30},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abkao","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rpp3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2tbu0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C816A9D0732711EC86214BA4FDD0B86B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f41m9","text":"Transfer supernatant to fresh 5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmfub","text":"Add 1568μl of Binding Solution and invert several times to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":18},{"style":"italic","offset":13,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amn0i","text":"Fill a silica spin column to capacity with the above mixture, centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature, discard flow-through and repeat until all mixture has passed through the spin column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47i39","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sd5m","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3n740","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aresd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"664dv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7f5ng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qjtb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FCA69A18732711EC86550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":3019,"brand":"Bio Inc.","link":"http://biobasic.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tsrf","text":"Add 392 μl of Wash Solution, centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature, discard flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":14,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d96c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etp4c","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"02358683732811EC86550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eoch","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1 min at room temperature, replace collection tube with a fresh 1.5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9k59s","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9a4j9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"04107035732811EC86550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lv6b","text":"Add 313μl of Elution buffer heated to 70°C directly to the silica filter membrane. Leave for 2 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":13,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ab7l","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000xg for 1min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0q3f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l2v7","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4gk5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"07902049732811EC86550A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6stv9","text":"Purified DNA is now in solution in the collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fuco","text":"Centrifuge at 1000xg for 30 seconds to remove liquid from the lids of tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jgs1","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kbnr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FE57F010B5A511EC9A8A517B935C2E48","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5brp","text":"As an alternative, 96 well silica plates may be used for processing at scale. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17hv2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2k29","text":"When using these, fill the column with 600μl of the above mixture and seal the plate with a breathable film.  Centrifuge at 4,000 xg for 5 minutes over a 2.2ml deep-well plate to collect the flow-though. Repeat until all mixture has passed through the spin column using a new breathable film each time the column if filled.
